item.title: Bitcoin Price Watch; Here's What's on for Today's Session
item.description:
Bitcoin Price Watch; Here's What's on for Today's Session

Here's what we are looking at in the bitcoin price for this morning out of Europe. Just as we did last night, let's kick things off with a chart. The chart below shows action in the bitcoin price across the last 48 hours or so, and has the levels that we outlined last night being the ones to watch still overlaid.

item.title: Bitcoin Price Watch; Tonight's Asian Session - NEWSBTC
item.description:
Bitcoin Price Watch; Tonight's Asian Session - NEWSBTC

Here's what we are looking at for tonight's session in the bitcoin price out of Asia The European session is drawing to a close, and it's heading into lunch time in the US. As usual, this means it's time for the second of our twice daily bitcoin price watch analysis pieces, so here goes.

item.title: Use Bitcoin at Amazon, AliExpress, and More With a Free Unichange Bitcoin Debit Card
item.description:
Use Bitcoin at Amazon, AliExpress, and More With a Free Unichange Bitcoin Debit Card

Bitcoin Press Release: Innovative Bitcoin exchange platform Unichange is pleased to announce the giveaway of free virtual Bitcoin debit cards that can be used at Amazon, AliExpress and more outlets. Starting today, Unichange launches its free giveaway of Unichange virtual debit cards to every customer ordering a Unichange plastic Bitcoin debit card.

item.title: Ethereum Price Technical Analysis - ETH Offers Trade Opportunities - NEWSBTC
item.description:
Ethereum Price Technical Analysis - ETH Offers Trade Opportunities - NEWSBTC

Ethereum price moved down and broke a support area. ETH/USD may trade a few points higher from here, but may face sellers. Ethereum price moved down and broke a support area. ETH/USD may trade a few points higher from here, but may face sellers.

item.title: Blockchain-based Revenue Platform Stem Announces US$4.5m Funding Round
item.description:
Blockchain-based Revenue Platform Stem Announces US$4.5m Funding Round

The software used by Stem, which is based on blockchain technology, lets creators aggregate data from a lot of different distribution platforms. Monetizing content on the Internet is not an easy task these days, but there are solutions under development as we speak.

item.title: EU Parliamentary Committee Shares Opinion on Virtual Currencies - NEWSBTC
item.description:
EU Parliamentary Committee Shares Opinion on Virtual Currencies - NEWSBTC

Regulation of virtual currencies is one of the most interesting topics in the European Parliament. A new report throws light on the technology. The importance of virtual currencies and its underlying blockchain technology is being recognized by the European Union, resulting a favorable outlook towards the cryptocurrency industry by the European Parliament.

item.title: Bitcoin Ponzi Scheme MMM Global Gains Supporters in South Africa
item.description:
Bitcoin Ponzi Scheme MMM Global Gains Supporters in South Africa

MMM is currently under investigation in South Africa by the Directorate for Priority Crime Investigation - HAWKS. There are mixed reviews about MMM Global, the alleged Ponzi scheme run by Sergey Mavrodi. While many people across the internet are calling it an elaborate fraud, there are those, a significant number of people in South Africa who are defending these very schemes.

item.title: What does Western Union Want With Digital Currency Group?
item.description:
What does Western Union Want With Digital Currency Group?

The future of cryptocurrency seems to be solidified more and more every month, with the growing interest in Bitcoin technology all over the world. Bitcoin has often been referred to as the disruption of the remittance sector, due to its global availability and low fees when sending money around the world.

item.title: Bitcoin Price Watch; Here's What's on this Morning - NEWSBTC
item.description:
Bitcoin Price Watch; Here's What's on this Morning - NEWSBTC

Here's what we are looking at in the bitcoin price for this morning out of Europe. It is the end of the week, and the bitcoin price looks to have settled down somewhat having experienced quite a lot of volatility across past few days.

item.title: Overview of Coinbase's Security in Brian Armstrong's Words - NEWSBTC
item.description:
Overview of Coinbase's Security in Brian Armstrong's Words - NEWSBTC

Brian Armstrong, the CEO and founder of Coinbase explains about some of the security features enabled by the platform in one of his blogs. Read more... Coinbase is one of the leading bitcoin wallet and exchange platform out there at the moment.
